string.text: Stalker, you're come to the Barrier, don't indulge, but we are happy to accept any help.
"Bullseye, come to us for calculation and further instructions"
Labeled, go back and take a stand
If the whole spending the night in the village on the Tower - then be SURE something is gonna happen...
Remember the mine - sapper wrong twice...
Tagged be careful - they say in the village there is a new anomaly is moving very quickly, besides, the bastard is not visible.
The attention of all wishing to thin out the brains - pass Radar guards detachment of the Monolith, I think you know that they shoot at all. Good luck.
In attack, the lads. Soak the lawyers.
Our mission will be accomplished. Go back to the farm and there will be a reckoning!
Come on, guys. The path is clear.
Labeled, be careful, and then another in the head with a bullet catch...
